snippet: A tearful Andy Murray celebrated taking Britain to its first Davis Cup semifinal in more than three decades, sealing a victory over France to line up a home series against Australia.
abstract: Great Britain defeats Kazakhstan, 3-2, to advance to semifinals of Davis Cup tennis tournament; other tennis news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and AGENCE FRANCE-PRESSE

lead_paragraph: A tearful Andy Murray celebrated taking Britain to its first Davis Cup semifinal in more than three decades, sealing a victory over France to line up a home series against Australia.

headline.main: Britain and Australia Advance at Davis Cup
